attributes.action: Stop income stealth tax and all other stealth tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition created to stop stealth tax. The income tax bands should be increased each year in line with inflation, so poorer people do not unfairly fall into higher tax bands as incomes rise as a result of inflation. The government has been unfairly cashing in on stealth tax and as a result the poor are getting poorer.
